channel.title: Tell Me Lies on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tell Me Lies on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Twisted Tale of Amanda Knox’: Grace Van Patten Confronts the Truth as Amanda Knox in Trailer
item.description: “For 15 years, I’ve been defined by something that I didn’t do,” says the ‘Tell Me Lies’ star in the Hulu series, which is also produced by Knox.

item.title: 30 Bingeworthy Young Adult Films and TV Shows Released in Recent Years
item.description: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty,’ ‘Never Have I Ever,’ ‘We Were Liars,’ ‘Elite’ and ‘My Fault: London’ are among popular projects that recently hit screens.
